data.name: Live Art
data.detailed_description:
HOW IT PLAYS

  • Click and hold to make the pen move through the lines.
  • Avoid the obstacles or the level will fail.
  • After you completed all the lines, the art will be revealed and animated. Looks pretty cool.

FEATURES

  • Very easy to understand
  • Very challenging
  • Animated picture after completing each level
  • Killing tons of time easily when playing alone
  • Having great laughs together when playing with friends or family
  • Making great materials for YouTubers and streamers
  • Making you wanna say bad words really badly sometimes. (But don't!).

HOW IT PLAYS

data.short_description: Hold to draw, avoid the obstacles, and bring the arts to life! Super easy to understand but very challenging and packed with tons of fun.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7 SP1+, 8, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHZ
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or GPU with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.12+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHZ
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or GPU with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Recommended:
